sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Flag Commission Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Flag Commission Act.

sections.heading: Repealer. This Act is repealed on January 1, 2026.
sections.text: Repealer. This Act is repealed on January 1, 2026.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
